mapper.select: SELECT r.r_id AS rId, r.r_date AS rDate, r.r_time AS rTime, r.r_status AS rStatus, r.doctor_id AS doctorId, r.patient_id AS patientId, i.patient_name AS patientName, i.patient_ssn1 AS patientSsn1, i.patient_phone AS patientPhone FROM reception r, patient i WHERE r.r_date=#{day} and i.patient_id = r.patient_id ORDER BY r.r_id DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO patient (patient_id, patient_name, patient_age, patient_sex, patient_ssn1, patient_ssn2, patient_phone, patient_zip, address, address_detail) VALUES (#{patientId}, #{patientName}, #{patientAge}, #{patientSex}, #{patientSsn1}, #{patientSsn2}, #{patientPhone}, #{patientZip}, #{address}, #{addressDetail});
